attributes.action: Extend and widen slip road on A12 between Chelmsford and Colchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The slip roads on the A12 between Chelmsford (Junction 19) and Colchester (Junction 26) are not very long for traffic joining the A12 in both north and south directions the worst is at Junction 20a for Hatfield Peveral which is often a site for motorists having to avoid other vehicles as it is virtually impossible to see vehicles on slip road seeing as it is so short
